  • Method Details

    • createNewAccount

      public Account createNewAccount(CurrencyCode currencyCode)
      This method creates a new account with a specified currency code.
      Parameters:
      currencyCode - it a an enum CurrencyCode.
      Returns:
      an Account object.

    • makeATransaction

      public Transaction makeATransaction(Account fromAccount, Account toAccount, @Nullable String description, float amount, Account feesAccount)
      This method creates a transaction object thanks to its parameters. And it saves this transaction into the database. A transaction is a move of money between two paymybuddy accounts.
      Parameters:
      fromAccount - is the account on which the money is taken from.
      toAccount - is the account on which the money is provided to.
      description - is a description for the transaction
      amount - is the amount of the transaction.
      feesAccount - it is a boolean used to applied fees or not. The applied percentage is set in ConstantConfig
      Returns:
      a transaction object and saves it in the database.

    • makeABankTransaction

      public BankTransaction makeABankTransaction(Account account, String iban, String swiftCode, String description, float amount)
      This method creates and saves a bank transaction into the database. A bank transaction is a transaction of money from a paymybuddy account to an external account.
      Parameters:
      account - is the paymybuddy account on which the money is being taken from.
      iban - is the iban number according to the ISO 13616.
      swiftCode - is the swift code according to the ISO 9362:1994.
      description - is a description of the transaction.
      amount - is the amount of the transaction.
      Returns:

    • getAllPagedTransaction

      public Paged<Transaction> getAllPagedTransaction(int pageNumber, int size, Account account)
      This method is used to get all transaction in a paged object.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - is the number of the current page you want to extract as a list from the paged object.
      size - is the size of the page(list) you want to extract from the paged object.
      account - is the account concerned by the extraction.
      Returns:
      a paged object.

    • makeAccountCredit

      public AccountCredit makeAccountCredit(Account account, float amount, String description, String creditCardNumber, String crypto, String expirationDate)
      This method creates and save an accountCredit object into the database and credit the account from the amount detailed in the method.
      Parameters:
      account - is the account on which the money is added.
      amount - is the amount added to the account.
      description - is a description for this transfert.
      creditCardNumber - is the credit card number with which you credit you paymybuddy account.
      crypto - is the cryptogram number of this credit card.
      expirationDate - is the expiration date of this credit card.
      Returns:
      an AccountCredit object saved in the database.
